description:
Aura`s father and the ruler of the Shurifon Kingdom, as well as the kingdom`s strongest Seikishi. He challenges Kenshi to race to see if he is truly capable of leading his men to battle. After he loses greatly to Kenshi`s ability, he arranged for Kenshi to marry Aura, to her delight. Later, when the King and Flora come on the Swan, they arrange that Kenshi marry both Aura and Maria, in an effort to unite the 3 kingdoms.
Source: Wiki
name: Shurifon Ou
